activity.title: coronasafe/care_dashboard#46
activity.text:
@nihal467 When previous and current data are unavailable, then `No data available ` is shown.
If one of them is present then the chart is rendered.
Even if an ordinary bed is at `0%`, the chart is generated.
This design is inspired by the previous dashboard design.
